name: LOG_SPEC_LASER
description: The LOG_SPEC_LSR table contains the specific special needs lasers that are required for a surgical log.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier or the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LASER_NEEDED_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the specific lasers used in a surgical log.
